name: VR Mountains and Hills Pack
description:
VR Mountains and Hills Pack is a package of two train rides for Google Cardboard glasses. You don't need any external controller to play this game. You control everything just by moving your head and focusing on to buttons you like to click.

VR Mountain Rollercoaster:
VR Mountain RollerCoaster is a relaxing VR ride in wild mountains. Explore the forest and enjoy the lakes in virtual reality. Birds flying around and singing will make this VR relaxing ride even better.

VR Wasteland Rollercoaster:
Catastrophic events lead to nuclear war and the end of the humanity. The only thing on the planet that still works is our RollerCoaster ride.

Note #1: This app requires a VR headset like Google Cardboard for best results.

Note #2: This virtual reality game was made for high-end phones with gyroscopes. It may work on slower phones, but you will experience a lower refresh rate.

If you like VR Mountains and Hills Pack, please give it a rate and a review.
